name: tap-junit
description: Silly small, silly easy junit output formatter for tap.

scripts.test: tape tests/pass.js | cross-env bin/tap-junit -o output/test -n pass -s suite-name -p
scripts.test:ava: cross-env bin/tap-junit --output output --name ava.xml --suite ava --input tests/ava.tap -p
scripts.ci:input: cross-env bin/tap-junit --output output --name api.xuni --suite api-test --input tests/non-tape.tap
scripts.ci:skip: tape tests/skip.js | cross-env bin/tap-junit -o output/test -n skip
scripts.ci:jtap: cross-env bin/tap-junit -o output -n dependencies.xml -i tests/j-tap.tap -c jenkins-deps
scripts.test:fail: tape tests/fail.js | cross-env bin/tap-junit --output output/test -n failure -p
scripts.test:yaml: cat tests/yaml.tap | cross-env bin/tap-junit -o output/test -n yaml
